p: The skin is the largest sense organ in humans and plays an important role in immune defense [ 55]. An inadequate immune defense can cause some types of dermatitis. Skin inflammation is closely related to the levels of cytokines and reactive oxygen species [ 56]. The essential oil from Curcuma longa (EOCl) [ 57] significantly reduced the levels of TNF- α, IL-6, and IL-1 in inflammatory models. The main components of EOCl are terpinolene and phellandrene. The essential oil from Citrus limetta Risso peels (Clp-EO) is also a candidate for treating skin inflammation [ 58]. Its main ingredient is limonene, which is not cytotoxic. It can inhibit the levels of TNF- α, IL-6, and IL-1 β in inflammation models and can reduce the levels of ROS under oxidative stress conditions. These two kinds of Chinese herbal essential oils can reduce the levels of various oxidative stress markers. They play antioxidant roles, including a therapeutic role in skin inflammation.
